name: ScriptUIImage

properties.name: format
properties.description: The image format. One of: resource, JPEG, GIF, TIFF, PNG, or PICT (Macintosh).

properties.name: name
properties.description: The image name. Either the file name, or the resource name.

properties.name: pathname
properties.description: The full path to the file that contains the image.

description: Encapsulates a set of images that can be drawn into a control.
longdesc: Different images can reflect the current state, such as a dimmed version for a disabled control. Create with the newImage() method. Passed as an argument to drawImage().
